body: Prepare the summoning chamber with swirling wind- and air-based spells to prevent the elemental from touching the floor. Maintaining this state for 5 rounds demonstrates the binder's superiority over the elemental, and grants a +4 bonus on the Charisma check.
name: Earth Elemental
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Binding Outsiders/Outsider Categories/Elementals and Genies/Earth Elemental
